snippet: In “My Boyfriend Barfed in My Handbag ... and Other Things You Can’t Ask Martha,” Jolie Kerr addresses the care of linens, the de-stinking of gym clothes and the sanitizing of sex toys.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book My Boyfriend Barfed in My Handbag... and Other Things You Can't Ask Martha by Jolie Kerr.
lead_paragraph: In “My Boyfriend Barfed in My Handbag ... and Other Things You Can’t Ask Martha,” Jolie Kerr addresses the care of linens, the de-stinking of gym clothes and the sanitizing of sex toys.

headline.seo: ‘My Boyfriend Barfed in My Handbag’ Offers Aid on Filth
headline.main: Cleaning Tips Mama Never Told You
